General.Name: TBC Bank Group PLC
General.Description: TBC Bank Group PLC, through its subsidiaries, provides banking, leasing, brokerage, insurance, and card processing services to corporate and individual customers in Georgia, Azerbaijan, and Uzbekistan. The company operates through Retail; Corporate; and Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises segments. It offers mortgage, digital, consumer, car, overdraft, and pawnshop loans; and term deposits, mortgage, credit cards; current, and nominee account services. In addition, the company provides internet, mobile, remote, and SMS banking; automatic, currency exchange, and wallet related services. Further, it offers payment protection, property, travel, critical illness, and auto insurance, as well as cashing order and safe deposit box services. Additionally, the company provides investment, brokerage, and corporate finance solutions, and card processing, leasing, PR and marketing, real estate management, asset management, computer and software, e-commerce, and postal services. TBC Bank Group PLC was founded in 1992 and is based in Tbilisi, Georgia.
